output:
You could be someone who tells me the truth Someone who wants me to leave
You can talk me into saving my own soul But I'm blind and you can't lead me on
You can take your chances till your time is up Making bets till all horses are dead
You can feel so alive until they lay you down That is all you'll ever know instead
You could be someone who tells me the truth Someone who wants me to leave
You can talk me into saving my own soul But I'm blind and you can't lead me on
